name: Pirate Frenzy
description:
Pirate Frenzy!

A small endless naval battle game I made in a couple days. You start with a simple sloop, but with a couple cannons you will climb to the top with huge ships of the line!

Controls cuz I forgor to add them in game:
- WASD to control the ship, W and S hoists and unhoists the sail, no need to keep holding!
- Click the starboard or larboard side of your ship to fire those cannons.
- Drive over collectibles to pick them up.
- If a ship has surrendered, it will have a halo around it. Click and hold it to abandon your current ship and claim the new one. Claimed ships are restored to 50% health.
